conbody.p: field attributesexpressionsYou can use expressions to add or modify field attributes for a record. For example, you can create a field attribute based on record data, then pass the record to a Stream Selector that routes data based on the attribute value.
You can also use field attribute functions in a field expression to include field attribute values in the record.
